name: AL-AGUKANNAN
body:
### Welcome.
I'm Alagukannan or just Al for who have trouble calling my full name. I have over 10 years experience developing and architect solutions primarily for the web. Over the years I have transitioned to different programming languages starting with classic ASP, PHP, Coldfusion, Java, C#, ASP.NET and currently working on salesforce.com platform.

I'm passionate about writing code that works efficiently and reliably. I do have a strong appetite for learning technologies that's outside of my comfort zone and master it to be comfortable with it.

My current areas of interest include Force.com platform development,  Single Sign on Authentication using OAuth2, SAML 2.

Other than programming I love playing cricket.

###Contact
I can be reached [twitter](https://twitter.acom/alagukannan]) or via [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alagukannan)
